alert.note: Alert for Cheatham; Davidson; Robertson; Sumner (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 29 at 2:46PM CDT by NWS Nashville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Davidson, west central Sumner, east central Cheatham and southeastern Robertson Counties through 315 PM CDT... At 246 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Ridgetop, or 9 miles southeast of Springfield, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hendersonville, Goodlettsville, White House, Millersville, Greenbrier, Coopertown, Ridgetop, Joelton, Beaman Park and Whites Creek. This includes the following highways... Interstate 65 between mile markers 97 and 109. Interstate 24 between mile markers 29 and 40. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
